title: Anatomy Blueprint
description: Defines the structural graph of how body parts connect via sockets

$schema.description: Optional. A URI reference to the schema that this document conforms to

id.description: Unique identifier for this anatomy blueprint in namespaced format (e.g., 'anatomy:humanoid_standard')

schemaVersion.description: Blueprint schema version. Use '2.0' to enable structure template features

root.description: The root entity definition ID that serves as the entry point for the anatomy graph

structureTemplate.description: Reference to structure template ID (schemaVersion '2.0' only). Pattern matches Common.schema.json namespacedId definition.

slots.description: Complete structural definition of body part slots and their requirements (v1 only, use additionalSlots in v2)

additionalSlots.description: Slots added beyond template-generated slots (schemaVersion '2.0' only)

clothingSlotMappings.description: Maps clothing slots to anatomy attachment points via blueprint slots or sockets (both v1 and v2)

parts.description: Simple list of blueprint parts to include (all slots and mappings) (v1 only)

compose.description: Advanced composition instructions for including blueprint parts (v1 only, deprecated in v2)

blueprintSlot.description: Defines a slot in the anatomy blueprint with its requirements

parent.description: The slot key of the parent part, or null for slots on the root

socket.description: The socket ID on the parent where this part attaches

optional.description: Whether this slot must be filled (default: false)

partRequirements.description: Requirements for selecting a body part

components.description: Required components that the part must have

clothingSlotMapping.description: Defines how a clothing slot maps to anatomy attachment points. Layer precedence: Recipe override > Entity default > Blueprint default. allowedLayers constrains all sources.

blueprintSlots.description: Blueprint slot IDs this clothing slot covers (e.g., ['left_hand', 'right_hand'])

anatomySockets.description: Direct socket IDs for parts with orientation-specific sockets (e.g., torso)

allowedLayers.description: Clothing layers allowed in this slot

include.description: Which sections to include from the part

excludeClothingSlots.description: Specific clothing slot keys to exclude
